description: Explore how blockchain technology is transforming the sports industry by enhancing financial transparency, boosting fan engagement through tokenization, and creating new revenue streams. Learn about real-world examples like Socios.com and NBA Top Shot, and understand the challenges and strategies to overcome them.
keywords: blockchain, sports industry, financial transparency, fan engagement, tokenization, Socios.com, NBA Top Shot, NFTs, cryptocurrency, sports funding
title: The Future of Sports: How Blockchain Funding is Changing the Game
